KDnuggets Home » News » 2018 » Jun » Meetings » Train your team in latest in Analytics, Data, Machine Learning, and Strategy ( 18:n24 )

Train your team in latest in Analytics, Data, Machine Learning, and Strategy

Previous post
Next post

 
 
Tags: Anaheim, Analytics, CA, TDWI

TDWI Anaheim takes place Aug 5-10. Register by Super Early Bird Deadline on Jun 22 to save up to $915 with priority code KD20. Teams save an EXTRA 10%. Register now!


 

The bigger the team, the bigger the savings
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
Super Early Bird Deadline: June 22
Save up to $915 with priority code KD20
Teams save an EXTRA 10%


 
 
 
VIEW AGENDA
 
 
 
At TDWI Anaheim, Teams Save Big
 
Building bonds and sharing experiences with your team is a critical component to getting the job done successfully. Each and every member of a team brings valuable insights, implicit knowledge, and unique perspectives.

Regardless of specialization, title, or department, everyone has a role to play in the data revolution. TDWI is dedicated to helping your team be ready for success in yours.
 
 
At TDWI, we know the value of teamwork.
 
At TDWI Anaheim, your team can divide and conquer to take advantage of over 60 courses on the hottest topics in data management and analytics.

When your team (3-9 people from a single company) registers at the same time, each member receives a 10% discount by using code TEAM. If you have a team of 10 or more people, each member can receive a 20% discount by using code TEAM20 during registration.

When you're done with your courses for the day, create some memories together by exploring the happiest place on earth: Disneyland! When you book accommodations at the conference hotel, you will have access to discounted special group theme park tickets.

Learn more about the conference. If you need assistance in planning your team's agenda, just reach out and we would be happy to help. Contact us at registration@tdwi.org.


Teams that Train with TDWI
The following is a sampling of companies that trust TDWI to train their team:
 
 
REGISTER NOW
 
 
Join us at the Leadership Summit
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
The TDWI Leadership Summit in Anaheim brings together expert speakers, case studies, and best practices to help you think through how to develop and deploy advanced analytics/data science initiatives.

You won't want to miss this interactive summit for business, IT,and analytics leaders who are bringing data science and advanced analytics into their organizations.
 
VIEW SUMMIT AGENDA
 
 
About TDWI
 
To review our Privacy Policy, please visit our website. 1105 Media, Inc., 9201 Oakdale Ave., Chatsworth, CA 91311
 
To know more or contact us for our services, just drop us a line at info@tdwi.org.
 
©2018 TDWI. All rights reserved.
